extensionDescription.message: Hide the YouTube™ fullscreen controls with the press of a hotkey or when you move the cursor to the display border.

hideVideoOverlaysPreferenceTitle.description: Title of the hide video overlays option

hideVideoOverlaysPreferenceDescription.message: Hide most video overlays including video recomendation cards at the end of a video and sponsored content note. Subtitles will not be hidden.
hideVideoOverlaysPreferenceDescription.description: Description of the hide video overlays option

hidePlayPauseAnimationPreferenceTitle.description: Title of the hide play pause animation option

hidePlayPauseAnimationPreferenceDescript.message: Hide the animated center button that is displayed when starting and stopping the video player.
hidePlayPauseAnimationPreferenceDescript.description: Description of the hide play pause animation option

useMouseSectionTitle.description: Title of the mouse interaction section

presetPreferenceDescription.message: Choose a preset of mouse interaction settings.

presetDropdownHideTitle.message: Hide when mouse is at border
presetDropdownHideTitle.description: Title of the 'hide' entry in the preset dropdown

presetDropdownHideDescription.message: Hide the controls when moving the mouse to the left or right border
presetDropdownHideDescription.description: Description of the 'hide' entry in the preset dropdown

presetDropdownShowTitle.message: Show when mouse is over controls
presetDropdownShowTitle.description: Title of the 'show' entry in the preset dropdown

presetDropdownShowDescription.message: Show the controls only when moving the mouse over the bottom controls or to any border
presetDropdownShowDescription.description: Description of the 'show' entry in the preset dropdown

presetDropdownCustomTitle.description: Title of the 'custom' entry in the preset dropdown

triggerDistancePreferenceTitle.description: Title of the trigger distance option

triggerDistancePreferenceDescription.message:
The threshold from each side at which the controls will be hidden.
All values are in pixel. Set the value to 0 pixels to disable interaction with the corresponding side. Disabled sides are colored red.
triggerDistancePreferenceDescription.description: Description of the trigger distance option

invertTriggerPreferenceTitle.description: Title of the invert trigger option

invertTriggerPreferenceDescription.message: Inverts the function of the mouse trigger so that they make the controls visible instead of hiding them.
invertTriggerPreferenceDescription.description: Description of the invert trigger option

onlyFullscreenPreferenceTitle.description: Title of the only fullscreen option

onlyFullscreenPreferenceDescription.message: Only hide the controls when the YouTube™ video is in fullscreen mode.
onlyFullscreenPreferenceDescription.description: Description of the only fullscreen option

useHotkeySectionTitle.description: Title of the hotkey usage section

hotkeyPreferenceDescription.message:
The hotkey toggles the visibility of the video controls.
Note that mouse movement will reshow the controls even if you just pressed the hotkey. If you don't like that, consider disabling the mouse interaction.
